messages.message: i don’t think it looks too bad? probably related to a pollen upgrade bc of https://github.com/instabase/pollen/pull/1140
ohh thanks for digging the PR up.

We do have styling overrides on the AIHub side. Don't know if we want to undo the custom styling.
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/05117c1cf9a3e52bbe972ae31adafd121aabce[…]2/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/lib/src/AIHub/SDropdown.tsx (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/05117c1cf9a3e52bbe972ae31adafd121aabce12/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/lib/src/AIHub/SDropdown.tsx#L11)

Can confirm that was a pollen update. I did that since dropdown link text colors were being overridden by AIHub’s base page styles (I think the blueprint ones that also have the blue focus outline style).
Unless there’s a complaint/concern about the darker text I’d lean towards keeping it black since that matches all our other dropdowns including the org switcher
Agreed. We can wait for feedback. If we don't get anything in a few weeks, we can delete the custom style overrides!
